title: Xiaomi 15 Ultra leaked renders show a weird camera arrangement
description: Xiaomi is due to launch the 15 and 15 Pro later this month, but the Ultra is only set to follow in February. Even so, today we have the first set of leaked renders showing the Xiaomi 15 Ultra, and it's definitely got a distinctive camera arrangement - and one that might not please fans of symmetry. While the camera bump itself is circular like it's always been in the Ultra line, the placement of the cameras themselves within the island is, as you can see, asymmetrical. According to the source of these shots, the lone camera on the top is the 200 MP 4.3x zoom periscope telephoto,...
excerpt: It's definitely not something we've seen often before. Xiaomi is due to launch the 15 and 15 Pro later this month, but the Ultra is only set to follow in...
text: Xiaomi is due to launch the 15 and 15 Pro later this month, but the Ultra is only set to follow in February. Even so, today we have the first set of leaked renders showing the Xiaomi 15 Ultra, and it's definitely got a distinctive camera arrangement - and one that might not please fans of symmetry. While the camera bump itself is circular like it's always been in the Ultra line, the placement of the cameras themselves within the island is, as you can see, asymmetrical. According to the source of these shots, the lone camera on the top is the 200 MP 4.3x zoom periscope telephoto, which uses Samsung's ISOCELL HP9 sensor. On the bottom row we can find the 50 MP main camera, the 50 MP ultrawide, and the 50 MP 2x telephoto. For selfies, you'll get a 32 MP snapper. Xiaomi 15 Ultra leaked renders The Xiaomi 15 Ultra is also rumored to come with a 6.7-inch 120 Hz LTPO OLED micro-quad-curved display, the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset at the helm, and a 6,000 mAh battery with support for 90W wired and 80W wireless charging. The Ultra should run HyperOS 2.0 based on Android 15 from day one. Source
html:
Xiaomi is due to launch the 15 and 15 Pro later this month, but the Ultra is only set to follow in February. Even so, today we have the first set of leaked renders showing the Xiaomi 15 Ultra, and it's definitely got a distinctive camera arrangement - and one that might not please fans of symmetry.

While the camera bump itself is circular like it's always been in the Ultra line, the placement of the cameras themselves within the island is, as you can see, asymmetrical.

According to the source of these shots, the lone camera on the top is the 200 MP 4.3x zoom periscope telephoto, which uses Samsung's ISOCELL HP9 sensor. On the bottom row we can find the 50 MP main camera, the 50 MP ultrawide, and the 50 MP 2x telephoto. For selfies, you'll get a 32 MP snapper.


Xiaomi 15 Ultra leaked renders

The Xiaomi 15 Ultra is also rumored to come with a 6.7-inch 120 Hz LTPO OLED micro-quad-curved display, the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset at the helm, and a 6,000 mAh battery with support for 90W wired and 80W wireless charging. The Ultra should run HyperOS 2.0 based on Android 15 from day one.

Source
